name: triggers-api
description: Triggers pattern through class and script language for node.js or browser

scripts.build: npx htmlbundler --list bundlelist.js --output triggers-api.bundled.js --id none --module 0 --wrap false && cp triggers-api.bundled.js triggers-api.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npx mocha test.js

author: allnulled
